title: Xfit x One Piece
content:
I don’t know if this is yet another case of the Mandela Effect or I’m just tripping. Weirdly enough I feel like I’ve seen way too many razor One Piece collaboration commercials, I always get the image of Zoro swinging a razor blade on an X pattern for some reason, I’m pretty sure this commercial is not the first to do it. But it’s such a missed opportunity to not have him handle three all at once and give his body a full shave.

Nice Film Gold acknowledgment. It feels like everyone is trying to make you forget about it when it was one of thebetter One Piece movies. If I was to get a razor from the ones shown here it would definitely be the Film Gold edition.

And of course, Chopper is somehow there, canonically it shouldn’t make sense but hey, the mascot must sell the stock.

Always lovely to see Law included. These commercials remind me of the weird period where Law was heavily involved during the Dressrosa Saga, nostalgic times.
